name: Welcome to the Shitshow
description:
• INFINITE UPGRADES
  • TITLE THAT REPRESENTS OUR AMBITION QUITE ACCURATELY
  • WE ARE AWFULLY SORRY

The game idea came up with a dialogue we had within the team where one of us woke up 7 hours after the jam had started and got greeted with "Welcome to the shitshow", since nothing had been decided thus far.

Entry for the Ludum Dare 39

Made by team Meowstache

Artist:

- Alexander Kämpe (Xerahim)

Portfolio: http://alexanderkampe.com/

Programmers:

- Matt Johnson (god)

- Bhavya Muni (Fruitz)

Music by Kevin MacLeod
